about_the_game:
Get ready to dive into a world that's richer, more distinct, and more dangerous than ever with the fourth expansion of the Erannorth Chronicles - "Untold Tales and Legends." This expansion takes you on an unforgettable journey filled with new Narrative Events, NPCs, Challenges, Enemies, and Cards.

With over 300 new cards, you can recruit new allies and explore exciting new mechanics to take your gameplay to the next level. Face over 105 new enemies and bosses with new tactic cards to keep your mid-level campaigns fresh and exciting.

Experience over 50 new narrative and NPC-initiated events for low to mid-level characters that will immerse you more in the world and give you insight into its rich lore. And with new low to mid-level quest chains, each with exclusive rewards you can't get anywhere else, you're in for an adventure like no other.

So, what are you waiting for? It's time to take Erannorth to the next level and experience the adventure of a lifetime with "Untold Tales and Legends."
detailed_description:
Disclaimer

DLCs for Erannorth progressively increase the game's complexity and difficulty and aren't recommended to own before you are familiar with the base game. If you try to decide which to get between the available DLCs, I would advise getting them in release order for a smoother transition in Difficulty and Complexity.


About the Game

Get ready to dive into a world that's richer, more distinct, and more dangerous than ever with the fourth expansion of the Erannorth Chronicles - "Untold Tales and Legends." Experience over 50 new narrative and NPC-initiated events for low to mid-level characters that will immerse you more in the world and give you insight into its rich lore. name: Erannorth Chronicles - Untold Tales and Legends

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Erannorth Chronicles - Untold Tales and Legends - $9.99

package_groups.title: Buy Erannorth Chronicles - Untold Tales and Legends

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 16/9 resolutions are supported in full screen.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64bit
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX12 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 16/9 resolutions are supported in full screen.

short_description: Experience a richer, more distinct, and dangerous world with the fourth Erannorth Chronicles expansion. "Untold Tales and Legends" will expand the world seamlessly with new Narrative Events, Challenges, Enemies, and Cards.
